Mike Pence of Indiana and Greg Walden of Oregon unveiled this week the Broadcaster Freedom Act, which would ban the FCC from forcing broadcasters to give free airtime to opposing sides on controversial issues. The American people cherish freedom, especially freedom of speech and of the press, said Mike Pence , a former radio talk show host who introduced the same bill in the last session of Congress when Democrats still controlled the House.`` Bringing back the Fairness Doctrine would amount to government control
